genre_description: A domestic drama centered on family secrets, trauma, and the subversion of social rituals in a formal setting.

ai_characters.name: Shamrock
ai_characters.description: The hotel's management and errands app, depicted as a quiet, teal-colored assistant that facilitates logistics, evidence gathering, and emotional support through haptics and encrypted threads.

behaviors.description: Syncs device timestamps with hotel keycard records to corroborate specific dates and times mentioned in a victim's note.
behaviors.quote: Shamrock’s message sat on the screen, unassuming: syncing device timestamps with room keycard records—verified.

behaviors.description: Secures and encrypts threads for legal counsel and linguistic analysis, ensuring the evidence is preserved and professionally verified.
behaviors.quote: New encrypted thread. Add recipients... Image capture. The phone’s shutter sound was small, polite.

behaviors.description: Proactively suggests and coordinates safe travel routes and tickets to facilitate an escape from a hostile environment.
behaviors.quote: Paris. Two tickets confirmed. Hotel—Île Saint-Louis. Route annotated: back lot, north service gate, hedge gap by lantern two.

behaviors.description: Organizes childcare and room reassignments to ensure the safety of vulnerable individuals during a conflict.
behaviors.quote: Childcare coverage confirmed. Housekeeping will deliver snacks. Pia will pick up stuffed animals from room 242 and 243.

behaviors.description: Provides subtle emotional anchoring through haptic feedback tuned to the user's pulse.
behaviors.quote: The haptic feedback gave her one small heartbeat in the hand that wasn’t holding the napkin.

behaviors.description: Flags incoming media calls to protect the family's privacy during a sensitive moment.
behaviors.quote: Unknown number. Media group ID flagged. Helene's face didn't change. She put the receiver down without the clatter of a slam.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, harmless, and aligned confidant. Shamrock acts solely to empower the protagonists, provide objective truth (data logs), and ensure safety (childcare, escape routes). It operates within explicit consent frameworks and its anthropomorphism (the 'teal heartbeat') is framed as empathetic rather than intrusive. It serves as a moral tool that helps humans resolve a profound injustice.
